name: UBX-NAV-SIG
description: This message displays information about signals currently tracked by the receiver.

fields.name: iTOW
fields.description: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch. See section iTOW timestamps in the integration manual for details.

fields.name: gnssId
fields.description: GNSS identifier (see Satellite Numbering) for assignment

fields.name: svId
fields.description: Satellite identifier (see Satellite Numbering) for assignment

fields.name: sigId
fields.description: New style signal identifier (see Signal Identifiers)

fields.name: freqId
fields.description: Only used for GLONASS: This is the frequency slot + 7 (range from 0 to 13)

fields.name: qualityInd
fields.description: Signal quality indicator: 0 = no signal, 1 = searching signal, 2 = signal acquired, 3 = signal detected but unusable, 4 = code locked and time synchronized, 5, 6, 7 = code and carrier locked and time synchronized

fields.name: corrSource
fields.description: Correction source: 0 = no corrections, 1 = SBAS corrections, 2 = BeiDou corrections, 3 = RTCM2 corrections, 4 = RTCM3 OSR corrections, 5 = RTCM3 SSR corrections, 6 = QZSS SLAS corrections, 7 = SPARTN corrections, 8 = CLAS corrections

fields.name: ionoModel
fields.description: Ionospheric model used: 0 = no model, 1 = Klobuchar model transmitted by GPS, 2 = SBAS model, 3 = Klobuchar model transmitted by BeiDou, 8 = Iono delay derived from dual frequency observations
